import React from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser'; import ProdLink from "pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Link" import Price from "pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Prices/Price" import Schema from "pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Schema" import OldPrice from "pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Prices/OldPrice" import { ProdImage } from 'pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Image' const Row = (props) => { const { prod, className } = props let className_f = className ? className : '' let prices =
return (
{prod.name} {prod.name}
{prices}

{ReactHtmlParser(prod.claim)}

{ReactHtmlParser(prod.description)}
{prices}

{ReactHtmlParser(prod.claim)}
) } export default Row /* */
